Visitor Management Software

# A streamlined experience for office visitors

Your employees are not the only ones coming back to the office. Empower your
teams to confidently welcome guests with secure visitor management solutions.

Book a demo

### Documents and registration

Send check-in instructions, NDAs, health questionnaires and other documents.

### Arrival notifications

Notify people automatically when their guests have arrived via email, Slack,
or Teams.

### Visitor badges

Quickly identify your visitors at a glance throughout the office by printing
physical badges*.

 _*hardware sold separately._

### Visitor data

Export data on guest visits and track who is coming in and out of your office.

### Visitor management system

## Leave a lasting impression

Create better guest experiences.

  1. Enables every employee to achieve their best outcomes with the right resources and information

  2. Communicate updated policies and guidelines to all locations with workplace announcements

  3. Prioritize connection by providing easy ways to create team events or activities

Get an overview of the platform

### Visitor management software

## Make managing guest visits painless

Simplify the process of welcoming guests into the office while still getting
the data you need to keep the office running.

  1. Keep up to date records of who visits the office for security

  2. Send automatic notifications to employees so visitors aren’t left waiting

  3. Cover compliance requirements with custom documents

## Resources for better workplaces

The guides, interviews, and research you need to start building a vibrant
workplace.

Blog Article

Engage employees, energize your workplace and embrace a shared purpose. High-
performing teams run on Robin.
